title: We're unable to log you in because you may be offline
body: So i was recently in a ranked game and the game just stopped, i turned off my computer because i thought it may have crashed. When i loaded it back up the corresponding thing prompted " We are unable to log you in because you may be offline" i went through the forums and got it fixed but now i got leavebuster for 5 games and it's 20 mins long. Please could you help me out with this? i got banned because a bug!

replies.body:
This is an issue impacting quite a few players right now, and updates are being provided on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  In the meantime, this workaround should resolve the issue:

Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Open "LeagueClientSettings.yaml" with notepad
Find the line:

gameflow-patcher-lock:

Delete this whole line
Save the file, restart your LoL Client - and you should be able to log in again.

If you received a leaverbuster as a result, hit us p in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  I can't make guarantees about having it removed, but we prefer review each case individually!
Has this issue been resolved or a better solution been found ? I Have not been able to play the last 3 days very frustrating. Please help
what about Mac players
Same happened to me, Please don't leaverbuster or require a long time queue for reentry. Hoping its solved as soon as the game is over.
Where do I submit for help just in case I am punished for server error?

something similar happened to me as well. Except instead of crashing, when my game started I had a steady 5k ms for a good 2min. I left so my team could initiate a remake. Then I tried logging back in it said I couldn't because it said I may be offline. I even used the hextech repair tool and it told me that my ping was around 23ms and that all packets were sent and received... wtf. This was the first game of this patch for me.
Same happened to me i was playing aram :P but still :({{champion:72}}
Same issue.... not resolving by any means

We're unable to log you in because you may be offline FIX:

Switch servers (I did Oceanic)

Reject User agreement (auto logs you out)

Log in and switch back to NA

This worked for me hope this helps!

Idk why i just tried this... just messed up my whole client.... thx
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
I tried this. And now it's stuck patching.... With nothing happening.
didn't work for me

I followed the steps Porocles laid out in the parent comment and I'm still having this issue. It did not work. I never left a game or anything like that, I just can't log in anymore. Why are the servers even still up if this is causing so many people to lose LP and dodge games?
Still having this issue. Just mentioning here because I saw this post was from 3 days ago.

Also during the time I was able to log in and play, I would have terrible lag spikes and my ping is locked in at around 51 ms. but it feels like I have 1000 ms.
It isnt my internet cause I can play other online game just fine.

Same problem here 

*Edit: Patch was automaticly uninstalled so I could still continu my ranked game. Afterwards It reinstalled again.
by me the same i lost lp and got leaverbooster

Hey Onyx!

I'm sorry this happened to you. A lot of people seem to have this issue atm. I want to ask you to submit a ticket to support and mention it happened because of this bug. It's no promise but that's the best way to go atm.
same happened to me , game just crashed and when i tried to reconnect i found myself banned!

Run errands, come back later and sit down for a ranked game of league. Everything goes fine until the game tries to load and gfx card error. Have to reboot and it takes forever of course. Finally get back in and get this error everytime.
